definition: to die
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
day/sky/heaven

sentences.english: The copyright of this manual is owned by Skyray Instrument Inc.
sentences.chinese: 本手册的版权归天瑞仪器有限公司所有。

sentences.english: It finally became a life in the bucket.
Mother had to go begging after Father's death.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸归天后，母亲只患上去讨乞。

sentences.english: I should go to the good God with my brother and my bishop.
sentences.chinese: 我要随着我的哥兼我的主教一同归天。

sentences.english: He was made to leave school by his father's death.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲的归天使他不患上不失学。

sentences.english: The bomb exploded and blew them all to kingdom come.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹爆炸把他们全都归天了。

sentences.english: My grandpa died two years in.
HIV Death life, but also did not face his family.
sentences.chinese: 染上艾滋命归天，还要家人没脸面。
